description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) requirement for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under Tier 1 Services for Application/Software Architecture, Security Level: Secret
full_summary:
## Service Announcement: Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)

### Shared Services Canada - Tier 1 - Application/Software Architect - Senior

#### Tender Reference Number
PW-22-01007639

#### Solicitation Number
R000109144

#### Publication Date
2022-09-19

#### Tender Closing Date
2022-10-18 14:00:00 EST

#### Amendment Number
1

#### Amendment Date
2022-10-04

#### Expected Contract Start Date
None

#### Expected Contract End Date
None

#### Tender Status
Expired

**Procurement Details**

* This tender is open only to Tier 1 Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified for services in the National Capital Region.
* The requirement is for a Senior Application/Software Architect, with a period of one year, plus two option periods of one year each.
* The selected supplier will work with Shared Services Canada (SSC) to provide technical expertise and services related to application and software architecture.
* The contract security level is Secret.

**Selected Suppliers**

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* A. Net Solutions Inc.
* Adhartas Consulting Inc.
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc., and Excel Human Resources Inc., in Joint Venture
* Beyond Technologies Consulting Inc.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* DONNA CONNA INC., IBM CANADA LIMITED IN JOINT VENTURE
* ENET4S SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS LTD
* IAN MARTIN LIMITED
* Ibiska Telecom Inc. and CM Inc., as a contractual Joint Venture
* IT/NET OTTAWA INC, KPMG LLP, in joint venture
* Miipe Inc.
* Neosoft Technologies Inc.
* Nisha Technologies Inc., Contract Community Inc., IN JOINT VENTURE
* Prologic Systems Ltd.
* REDspace Inc.

**Contact Information**

* Contact Name: Julie Bampton
* Contact Email: julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: 613-790-5915
* Contact Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0P7, Canada

**Important Notes**

* Bidders are advised that BuyandSell.gc.ca is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
